entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 18. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this morning. Clearing this afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this morning. High minus 18. Wind chill minus 32 this morning and minus 26 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Monday 30 January 2023
